snippet.title: Cyclopean Gameplay Short
snippet.description:
This is a brief gameplay video from my game jam entry called "Cyclopean." It is a classic, turn based dungeon crawler in which you, Randolph Carter, must rescue the cats and escape from the Vaults of Zinn. 

In this video we can see a few short battles with the Zoogs, who have captured you and the cats.  

Interestingly, there is a moment at the 9 second mark where I suspected that there might be a second Zoog to my right.  This is the value of having the text readout at the bottom, which confirmed my suspicion.  It allowed me to prevent getting teamed up on by two enemies at once.

Check out Cyclopean, and the other dungeon crawlers in the Dungeon Crawler Jam 2024 in Itch!
https://itch.io/jam/dcjam2024/rate/2612178
